channel.title: Bus manufacturing on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Bus manufacturing on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 North American Bus Industries Logo
NABI Bus, LLC was a manufacturer of heavy-duty transit buses with its headquarters, bus manufacturing and assembly operations, located in Anniston, Alabama. Its products ranged from 31-feet to 60-feet in length, and were sold to operators throughout the United States and Puerto Rico. NABI’s U.S. operations also include an aftermarket parts division in Delaware, Ohio, and an after-sales service center at Mira Loma, California. The company was acquired by New Flyer Industries in 2013, which in 2015 discontinued production of NABI’s product lines at the Anniston plant.
You can download theNABIlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: NABI
item.description: NABI Bus, LLC was a manufacturer of heavy-duty transit buses with its headquarters, bus manufacturing and assembly operations, located in Anniston, Alabama. Its products ranged from 31-feet to 60-feet in length, and were sold to operators throughout the United States and Puerto Rico. NABI’s U.S. operations also include an aftermarket parts division in Delaware, Ohio, and an after-sales service center at Mira Loma, California. The company was acquired by New Flyer Industries in 2013, which in 2015 discontinued production of NABI’s product lines at the Anniston plant.
